items.name: Margherita Pizza
items.description: Topped with fresh mozzarella, basil leaves, and a rich tomato sauce, drizzled with olive oil for a classic Italian flavor.A timeless Italian classic! Freshly baked with a blend of creamy mozzarella, flavorful tomato sauce, and fragrant basil leaves, drizzled with extra virgin olive oil for the perfect balance of simplicity and elegance.

items.name: Pepperoni Pizza
items.description: A crowd favorite! Crispy, spicy pepperoni layered over a bed of gooey mozzarella and our signature tomato sauce, baked to perfection for an irresistible bite every time.

items.name: Hawaiian Pizza
items.description: A sweet and savory delight! Juicy pineapple chunks and savory ham atop a cheesy, golden crust with our rich tomato or smoky barbecue base. A tropical twist that surprises and satisfies!

items.name: BBQ Chicken Pizza
items.description: A bold fusion of flavors! Tender grilled chicken, tangy barbecue sauce, red onions, and a generous layer of melted mozzarella, garnished with fresh cilantro for a smoky, mouthwatering experience.

items.name: Buffalo Wings
items.description: Classic and bold! Crispy wings tossed in a tangy, spicy Buffalo sauce, served with a side of cool ranch or creamy blue cheese for the ultimate kick.

items.name: Honey Garlic Wings
items.description: Sweet meets savory! Juicy wings coated in a luscious honey garlic glaze, with a hint of garlic that’s perfect for satisfying your cravings.

items.name: Barbecue Wings
items.description: Smoky and sweet! Tender wings slathered in a rich barbecue sauce, grilled to perfection for that irresistible charred flavor.

items.name: Lemon Pepper Wings
items.description: Zesty and flavorful! Golden-fried wings dusted with a tangy lemon pepper seasoning, delivering a burst of citrusy goodness in every bite.

items.name: Coca-Cola
items.description: The timeless classic! Ice-cold and perfectly fizzy, Coca-Cola pairs well with every meal.

items.name: Sprite
items.description: Crisp and refreshing lemon-lime soda with a bubbly twist. A light and zesty favorite!

items.name: Fanta Orange
items.description: Bursting with fruity flavor! Fanta Orange is sweet, tangy, and fun in every sip.

items.name: Bottled Water
items.description: Stay hydrated with pure, crisp bottled water—an ideal choice for a light, refreshing drink.

items.name: Vanilla Delight
items.description: Smooth and creamy vanilla ice cream, a classic flavor that never goes out of style. Perfect on its own or paired with your favorite toppings!

items.name: Chocolate Indulgence
items.description: Rich and velvety chocolate ice cream, crafted for chocoholics who crave a decadent, sweet treat.

items.name: Strawberry Bliss
items.description: Refreshing and fruity strawberry ice cream, made with real strawberries for a naturally sweet and tangy flavor.

items.name: Cookies and Cream
items.description: A delightful mix of creamy vanilla ice cream and chunks of chocolate cookies, creating a perfect blend of crunch and smoothness.
